Package ru.dest.library.plugin

Interface IPluginRegistry<T extends IPlugin>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of main class which must implement a IPlugin interface
public interface IPluginRegistry<T extends IPlugin>
Registry of this plugin

    register​(PluginListener<?> @NotNull ... listeners)
    Register all pointed listeners
    void
    registerCommands​(String packageName)
    Method to register all command in given package Only register a command which implementing ICommand interface and has constructor with one parameter which is an object that implements IPlugin interface
    void
    registerListeners​(String packageName)
    Method to register all listeners in given package Only register a listeners which extending PluginListener class and has constructor with one parameter which is an object that implements IPlugin interface

    • registerCommands

      void registerCommands​(String packageName)
      Method to register all command in given package Only register a command which implementing ICommand interface and has constructor with one parameter which is an object that implements IPlugin interface
      Parameters:
      packageName - name of package

    • registerListeners

      void registerListeners​(String packageName)
      Method to register all listeners in given package Only register a listeners which extending PluginListener class and has constructor with one parameter which is an object that implements IPlugin interface

      packageName - name of package
